app_id.desc: The id of the app whose resolution you want to clear/undo.

enterprise_id.desc: The enterprise to clear the app resolution from.

team_id.desc: The workspace to clear the app resolution from.

errors.app_management_app_not_installed_on_org: The app management app must be installed on the org.
errors.feature_not_enabled: Returned when the Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team
errors.no_resolution_found: No existing resolutions were found for the given `team` and `app_id`.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins
errors.access_denied: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
errors.team_not_found: Returned when team id is not found.
errors.restricted_action: This actor does not have access to the permissions on this resource.
